/*   Anurag Anand  */

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cassert>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>

#define reverse(a) (a=(a==1)?0:1)

using namespace std;


int main()
{
    int nCase;
    scanf("%d",&nCase);
    while(nCase--)
    {
       int num,k;
       scanf("%d%d",&num,&k);   
       int n=1;
       while(num--) n=n<<1;
       n-=1;
       //printf("n= %d   Rem= %d\n",n,k%(n+1));
       if(k%(n+1)==n) printf("ON\n");
       else printf("OFF\n");      
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;  
}
